mapper.update: create table if not exists p_${chatId} ( messageId int primary key auto_increment comment '消息id', senderId varchar(255) not null comment '发送者id', receiverId varchar(255) not null comment '接收者id', type varchar(10) not null comment '消息类型', text varchar(1000) comment '文本消息', image varchar(255) comment '图片名字数组', video varchar(255) comment '视频名字数组', audio varchar(255) comment '音频名字', file varchar(255) comment '文件名字', replyStatus int not null comment '0不是回复，1是回复', replyId varchar(255) comment '被回复的消息id', createDate datetime not null comment '创建时间', updateDate datetime not null comment '更新时间', status int not null comment '0为正常，1为被删除，2为编辑过' )
mapper.select: select chat_id from private_conversation where ((one_id = #{oneId} and two_id = #{twoId}) or (one_id = #{twoId} and two_id = #{oneId})) and del_flag = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into private_conversation (chat_id, one_id, two_id,create_date, update_date,del_flag) value( #{chatId}, #{oneId}, #{twoId}, now(), now(), 0);
